text: EC_Week 11, Non-assessed A series LCR circuit with L = 10 mH, C = 2 µF and R = 5 Ω is driven by a generator with an amplitude of 100 V and variable angular frequency ω. Find (a) the resonant frequency ω0 and (b) the rms current at resonance. When ω is 8000 rad/s find (c) the impedance Z, (d) the rms current.
